title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 104-A
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 104-A
State Regulations
NACC C-16
(Auth Reg ยง 2007.1)
STATE OF NEW YORK NARCOTIC ADDICTION CONTROL COMMISSION
N. A.C.C. NO. ________
N. Y.S.I.I.S. NO. ________
WARRANT FOR ARREST AND DETENTION OF
DELINQUENT NARCOTIC ADDICT (M.H.L. 211.4)
TO ANY STATE POLICE OFFICER OR ANY OTHER PEACE OFFICER IN THE
STATE: Having reasonable cause to believe that ________, a narcotic
addict certified to the custody of the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission, has escaped or disappeared from lawful custody or supervision and has been duly
declared delinquent by the said Commission, now, therefore, pursuant to the
provisions of Article 9 of the Mental Hygiene Law and the regulations of the

Narcotic Addiction Control Commission, I hereby order that said narcotic addict
be arrested, placed in detention, and returned to the custody of the Narcotic

Addiction Control Commission, and for so doing this shall be your sufficient
warrant. NEW YORK STATE NARCOTIC ADDICTION
CONTROL COMMISSION
Dated: ________, 19________ Per
____________
Authorized Signature
____________
Typed Signature
____________
Address
________
I HEREBY CERTIFY that I executed the above warrant at ________
o'clock in the ________ noon on the ________ day of ________, 19 ________, by
apprehending the above-named narcotic addict and placing him in a place of
detention on behalf of the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission; and that at
the time of apprehension of the said narcotic addict, I exhibited the appended
warrant and informed the said narcotic addict of the purpose for which he was
being taken into custody. Dated: ________, 19________ ________
Note: 1. EXECUTED
DUPLICATE ORIGINALS HAVE THE SAME FORCE AND EFFECT AS THE PRIME ORIGINAL FOR
ALL PURPOSES WHATSOEVER
2. Officer
retaining delinquent should notify the Director of Resident Movement &
Census Control of the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission at (212) 765-0525
to arrange return of the said delinquent to the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
104-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
